title: Protocol
description: A specialisation of O&M's process, initially defined for the analytical chemistry domain of the UNESCO-IOC Ocean Acidificiation project

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for this protocol

instrument.title: instrument
instrument.description: A URL linking to a controlled vocabulary term defining the instrument make and model used in this instance of the protocol

laboratory.title: laboratory
laboratory.description: A URL to a controlled vocabulary term defining the laboratory responsible for the observation made using this instance of the protocol

methodology.title: methodology
methodology.description: Either an object or a URL giving a description of a reference to, for example, a journal article and some descriptive parameters for an analytical methodology

quality.title: quality
quality.description: Either an object or a URL giving a description of the quality (limits of detection, accuracy, precision, uncertainty) of an analytical protocol
